original_title: Schools’ 2nd phase of 1st term begins tomorrow
original_body_lines: The Education Ministry today announced that all government and government-assisted private schools will reopen for their second phase of the first school term on Monday (17).
These schools were closed for vacation for the first phase of the first school term on April 4.
Moreover, the ministry also draws the attention of authorities to the special announcement made earlier regarding the admission of students to the intermediate grades of schools.
Accordingly, the circular regarding the admission of students to intermediate grades will be issued on April 20.
The admission of students to intermediate grades from Grades 2 to 4 and Grades 7 to 10 in national schools will be as per the relevant circulars.
The ministry will not issue any letters in order to admit students for the intermediate grades in national schools until then. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
